replies.msg: æˆ´æ²»æ¶è´å’—æ‘©ä½¬å€‹manager of the month

United stars had not forgotten the video of the City dressing room singing “park the bus” after winning the derby at Old Trafford in December.

Jose Mourinho’s men, who were dishing out the verbals on the pitch in the second half, turned their music up in the Etihad changing area as loud as possible after their stunning comeback.

They were just as noisy on the pitch, with the Red Devils goading their rivals after discovering they had booked tables all over Manchester on Saturday night to celebrate their title win.

“Booked tables have you? We’ll take your f***ing tables” were among some of the bitchy comments directed at City players when United got back into the game.

Local lad Jesse Lingard, feuding with Fernandinho after the break, was among the most vocal after Paul Pogba scored twice and Chris Smalling netted United’s winner.
